overview: This thirty minute play brought to screen via TV in the 60s is set almost entirely in one room and revolves around a nameless man and a mysterious woman. It was written by Lynne Reid Banks, without of the L-Shaped Room (1960) and was the directorial debut of June Howson who went on to direct many plays and series for Anglia and Granada, where she graduated to producing.
title: Already It’s Tomorrow
